welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Desio, the charming city known for its rich history, beautiful architecture and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our culture, cuisine, and all that Desio has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Linate Airport, mainly used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require re-connection after a certain amount of time.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, mainly serving low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration and have time limits.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lugano Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and executive flights, offering VIP services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
